        public java.util.ArrayList<BuildingPOI> nearestNeighbors(com.esri.core.geometry.GeometryEngine geomen,
                                                BuildingPOI[] builds,
                                                java.util.ArrayList<com.esri.core.geometry.Polygon> footprints,
                                                GeoInfo[] geoInfos,
                                                com.esri.core.geometry.SpatialReference spaRef,
                                                double radius,
                                                com.esri.core.geometry.Unit unit)
        Function which finds the POIs below a distance of radius unit from the point and calculates the distances between the user and the POIs
        Parameters:
        geomen - : A geometry engine (Esri)
        builds - : The array of buildings
        spaRef - : the spatial reference
        radius - : The distance to consider a geometries like a NN (Nearest Neighbor)
        unit - : The distance's unit
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of buldings which qre the nearest geometries to the point

        spaRef: - the spatial reference
        radius: - The distance to consider a geometries like a NN (Nearest Neighbor)
        unit: - The distance's unit
        Returns:
